source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_00<tab>Radovan is keen for you to put your newly acquired skills into practice.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_00<tab>茨の森のラドヴァンは、ガンブレイカーとなった冒険者を見定めている。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_01<tab>With your gunblade and soul crystal in hand, you have everything you need to begin your training as a gunbreaker. Instead of employing traditional methods, Radovan would rather you learned on the job, and suggests seeking work in Gridania. Since he and Sophie are newcomers to the Shroud, you suggest that they make the Adventurers' Guild their first port of call.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_01<tab>ラドヴァンと話し、冒険者ギルドで仕事を探すことになった。グリダニアのカーラインカフェで「ラドヴァン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive at the Carline Canopy to discover that not only have Sophie and Radovan registered as adventurers, they have also been given the details of someone seeking to hire bodyguards. You follow your new companions to the Wailing Barracks to meet a man named Lassenchou, your first client.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_02<tab>ラドヴァンは護衛の依頼を紹介されたようだ。グリダニアの鬼哭隊屯所付近で依頼人の「ラサンシュー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_03<tab>Following the briefest of introductions, Lassenchou reveals that the renowned harpsichordist Editha's life may be in danger. In addition to receiving a death threat, she narrowly escaped being injured by a stone thrown during a recent performance. In his capacity as her manager, Lassenchou has ordered that she remain inside until the perpetrator can be brought to justice. However, the musician has expressed her reluctance to remain confined any longer and insists upon taking an invigorating stroll through the sun-dappled groves of Gridania. As your task is to keep her safe from harm during the outing, Radovan suggests scouting the area and questioning the locals to ascertain the nature of those who seek to intimidate Editha.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_03<tab>ラサンシューと話し、殺害予告を受けたエディシアの護衛をすることになった。ラドヴァンは彼女の情報を集めたいようだ。グリダニアのミィ・ケット野外音楽堂付近で情報収集しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_04<tab>Quizzing a handful of Gridanians reveals a range of opinions on the popular harpsichordist. Perhaps the most pertinent tidbit of information is that some of Editha's followers have taken their infatuation to worrying levels, which Radovan will no doubt be interested to hear.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_04<tab>エディシアについて情報収集した。脅迫者は彼女の過激なファンという噂のようだ。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂付近の「ラドヴァン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_05<tab>You find Radovan engaged in a rather one-sided conversation with a lady named Ondine, who seems all too eager to share her opinions with any and all who will listen. Her views are in line with the general consensus that the person threatening Editha is likely to be one of her admirers, although Radovan avoids jumping to conclusions for the time being, deciding to view anyone and all with equal suspicion. Although he would prefer to obtain more reliable information before beginning the assignment, he decides against keeping the client waiting for longer than necessary.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_05<tab>ラドヴァンに話したところ、オンディヌという女性と話していた。エディシアの護衛を開始するため、鬼哭隊屯所付近で「ラサンシュー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_06<tab>You return to Lassenchou to find him bedecked in an elaborate suit of armor, seemingly intent on joining you, while Editha prances around, blissfully oblivious to the danger she faces. Though Radovan is clearly exasperated that your charge has next to no chance of remaining undetected, he formulates a plan of action, wherein you and your mentor will lead the mission while Lassenchou and Sophie remain behind, ready to provide support if needed. Upon embarking on what is supposed to be a sedate promenade through Gridania, you are soon accosted by bandits and savage creatures, all commanded by an enigmatic masked woman.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_06<tab>護衛を始めると、盗賊団が襲撃してきて、黒幕らしき仮面の女が現れ、魔物をけしかけてくるのだった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_07<tab>Overwhelmed by the combined might of two gunbreakers, the masked villain is forced to reveal her true identity: Ondine, one of the locals you spoke with during your investigation. She, like Editha, is a harpsichordist, although her popularity waned as her followers deserted her in favor of her young rival. Her hatred festering within her, Ondine sought the cooperation of local highwaymen, and even hired them to assassinate Editha on the road through the Shroud. In a bizarre turn of events, Sophie's distinctive Viera ears were mistaken for the musician's trademark bunny crown adornment, leading the bandits to attack Sophie instead. While your assignment has ended successfully, there is one more matter Editha wishes to discuss with you in private─a secret to which even her manager Lassenchou cannot be made privy.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_07<tab>エディシアの護衛を完了した。彼女に嫉妬するオンディヌが、盗賊団を雇って襲わせたようだ。エディシアが話したいことがあるという。グリダニアのグレートローム農場で「エディシア」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_08<tab>In a secluded corner of the Greatloam Growery, Editha reveals her true identity: she is in fact a disguised sylph. Dispelling her glamour, she explains that she has been visiting Gridania and enchanting the crowds with her prodigious harpsichord playing, with no one suspecting a thing, least of all Lassenchou. Although she was under no obligation to share this secret with you, she felt that since you risked your lives to protect her, you deserved to know the truth. She also states that her desire to walk outside was not merely a selfish whim, but one born of the utmost necessity, as sylphs wilt and eventually die if deprived of the sun's rays. After Editha says her farewells, Radovan takes the opportunity to tell you more of the gunbreaker's origins and his clan's place in keeping their traditions alive. Since he is the last survivor of his people, it is his duty to pass the art of the gunblade on to the next generation, with you as the prime candidate to become his successor. While the burden is indeed a heavy one, he is committed to helping you gain the necessary skills and experience. As they intend to broaden their horizons, Sophie and Radovan suggest moving on to Ul'dah to seek out their next client.

※In order to travel to Ul'dah, you must first complete the main scenario quest “<var 09 E947 ((The Lominsan Envoy)) ((The Gridanian Envoy)) ((The Ul'dahn Envoy)) /var>.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_08<tab>エディシアと話し、彼女の正体がシルフ族だと明かされた。光合成が欠かせないため、外に出る必要があったようだ。ラドヴァンは次の仕事をウルダハで探すという。ウルダハのクイックサンドで「ラドヴァン」と話そう。

※「メインクエスト：新生エオルゼア」の「<var 09 E947 ((森都と砂都と)) ((海都と砂都と)) ((海都と森都と)) /var>」を完了することで、「ウルダハ」へ行くことができるようになります。

source:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_09<tab>Sophie and Radovan have already begun looking for work, although their search has yet to bear fruit. Rather than waiting idly for a chance to come your way, Radovan recommends that you use the time available to work on your sword arm, so that you may be ready for whatever fate has in store.

※The next gunbreaker quest will be available from Radovan upon reaching level 63.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SEQ_09<tab>ラドヴァンと話した。護衛の仕事が入るまで、冒険者は腕を磨くことになった。

※ガンブレイカーのレベルが63以上になると、クイックサンドのラドヴァンから次のガンブレイカークエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_000<tab>Perhaps some of your acquaintances in Gridania would have work for us?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_000<tab>アタシたちは、冒険者というものにも疎いんで、
キミがいてくれると助かるよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_001<tab>Now that the gunbreakers of eld have yielded a portion of their wisdom, you are ready to take blade in hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_001<tab>いいぞ、様になっているじゃないか。
私の見込みどおり、きっと君には才があるはず。
すでにソウルクリスタルから、いくつか技も引き出せたことだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_002<tab>Rather than spend moons and moons training you, perhaps we had best find employment first. We can use the time between assignments to refine your abilities. But where should we start?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_002<tab>さて、これから私たちは、ともに護衛稼業を始めるのだ。
仲間となる君の名を聞いておこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_003<tab>The Adventurers' Guild... Yes, that sounds quite promising.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>だな……
これからよろしく頼む！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_004<tab>I suppose we <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> adventurers, after all.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_004<tab>よろしくね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ところで、グリダニアへ向かう前に、
冒険者のキミに、先んじて聞いておきたいことがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_005<tab>Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, are you familiar with this sort of thing?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_005<tab>エオルゼアでは、アタシたちのような余所者でも、
冒険者になれば、自由に仕事ができると聞いたんだけど……
そのためには、まずどうすればいいものかな？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_006<tab>Oh my! In that case, we couldn't have found a better guide!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_006<tab>なるほど、冒険者ギルドってところに登録することで、
冒険者として活動できるようになるんだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_007<tab>Well, there's no time like the present. Shall we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_007<tab>よし、それでは一路、
グリダニアの冒険者ギルドとやらへ向かおう！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_009<tab>You know, “adventurer” sounds a lot more romantic than “hired muscle,” even though that's essentially what it is.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_009<tab>冒険者って、自由で伸び伸びとしていて、
いいもんだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_010<tab>Now that Mother Miounne has made us formal members of the Adventurers' Guild, we can start accepting assignments.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_010<tab>ミューヌさんと話して、冒険者としての登録は済ませた。
自由な働き方を支援してくれる冒険者ギルドとは、
なかなか、よい制度だな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_011<tab>In fact, we've already been given the details of a potential client in need of a bodyguard or two.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_011<tab>帝国に統制された属州国では考えられないね。
そして、護衛稼業の相談をしたら、ちょうどギルドに、
護衛の依頼がきてたもんで、さっそく紹介してもらったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_012<tab>A man named Lassenchou is waiting by the Wailing Barracks. Sophie and I will try making our own way there, to get our bearings.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_012<tab>依頼人の「ラサンシュー」という人が、
鬼哭隊屯所近くの建物前にいるので、まずは話を聞きにゆこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_015<tab>We thought it best to wait for you before we introduce ourselves.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_015<tab>まずは、依頼人のラサンシューさんから話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_016<tab>I feel strangely at home here. It's not at all like the cities in the Empire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_016<tab>この街は、森とうまく調和しているね。
自然まで支配せんとする帝国とは大違いだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_020<tab>You must be the ones sent by the Adventurers' Guild, yes? Oh, thank goodness! Something dreadful has befallen─well, threatens to befall─the one and only Editha!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_020<tab>初めまして、ラサンシューといいます。
護衛していただきたいのは、私が世話係をしている、
あの超人気ハープシコード奏者、「エディシア」嬢です。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_021<tab>You mean to say you are unfamiliar with the most gifted harpsichordist who ever lived!? Whatever possessed me to hire such uncultured b─ Ahem! It appears my breath would be better spent briefing you on the nature of my request.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_021<tab>ど、どなたもご存じないようですね……。
とにかく、エディシアはいま売れっ子の奏者なんですが、
先日、彼女に殺害を予告する脅迫状が届いたのです……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_022<tab>A few days ago, Editha received a most unwelcome missive─a death threat, to be precise. At first, I deemed it nothing more than the crazed scrawlings of some harmless churl. That was until, during a recital, a stone was thrown at her, missing by a hair's breadth!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_022<tab>最初はタチの悪い悪戯くらいに考えていたのですが、
練習の帰り道に、何者かに投石される事件が発生しまして……。
幸い、彼女には当たりませんでしたがね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_023<tab>I have, in my capacity as her manager, canceled all public appearances until the perpetrator can be brought to justice.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_023<tab>それからというもの、犯人が捕まるまではと、
エディシアには音楽活動を休止させ、外出を控えさせています。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_024<tab>I fear, though, that my delicate tulip would wither and fail if confined to her dressing room. And she has herself expressed a desire to stroll freely beneath the canopies of Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_024<tab>しかし、そんな彼女がどうしても外に出て、
ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂まで散歩がしたいと言って聞かないんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_025<tab>I see where this is going─ You want us to take her for a walk, is that it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_025<tab>えっ！？
それじゃあ、今回の依頼って散歩を護衛するだけ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_026<tab>If that's all we have to do, we should count ourselves lucky. A threatening letter, a brazen attack in a public place... Who knows what will happen next? But she can't stay indoors forever. I say we accept.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_026<tab>いや、脅迫された者の身を思えば、事態は深刻だろう。
何より意にそぐわず、部屋に籠もらされているとは不憫だ。
エディシアさんをお護りしよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_027<tab>Splendid. Without any further ado, I shall have Editha prepare for her promenade.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_027<tab>よろしくお願いします。
それでは、私は支度を始めるので、
そちらも準備が整い次第、またお訪ねください。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_028<tab>Hmm... We'd best proceed carefully. If the culprit knows that Lassenchou asked the Adventurers' Guild for help, they can probably deduce that Editha will be coming out of hiding.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_028<tab>さっそく、初仕事といきたいところだが、
その前に護衛対象について、もう少し知っておきたい。
エディシアさんについて、街中で情報収集しておこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_029<tab>We should see if anyone bears a grudge against her, so we know what to expect. And we'd better look around the amphitheatre for places where an ambusher might hide.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_029<tab>彼女の噂や評判を聞くことで、
犯人の見当もつくかもしれない。
目的地の視察もかねて、野外音楽堂の周辺で聞き込みをしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_035<tab>If you notice anything, no matter how small, be sure to let me know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_035<tab>この辺りで、エディシアさんについて聞き込みをして、
私に報告を頼む。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_036<tab>It sounds like this Editha has quite the following. Whether that's due to her musical abilities or her eccentric stage persona is hard to tell, though.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_036<tab>エディシア、すごい人気みたいだけど、
かなり変わった娘らしいね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_000_037<tab>Oh, yes. She's veeery talented...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_000_037<tab>エディシアは素晴らしい才能を持っているわ……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SIMPKIN_000_040<tab>Oh, Editha! Even a moment deprived of her sumptuous harmonies is akin to an eternity of unimaginable torment! When, oh when, will she grace me with her splendor once more?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SIMPKIN_000_040<tab>エディシアについて知りたいって？
彼女はグリダニア音楽界に彗星のごとく現れた天才さ。
とにかくその演奏力は、人間離れしているんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ESTAINE_000_041<tab>Why yes, Editha has been the talk of Gridania since her debut. Her skill as a musician is without question, although I sense that many of her admirers are more interested in her bizarre stage garb.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ESTAINE_000_041<tab>エディシアの音楽会は常に満員御礼だよ。
その演奏力もさることながら、彼女の奇抜なファッションや、
個性的なキャラクターが、市民たちの人気を集めているようだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_FRANCQUET_000_042<tab>Know of her? I certainly do! I would consider myself to be one of her many admirers. In all honesty, I do not care for the way some of the others...ogle her.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_FRANCQUET_000_042<tab>俺はエディシアに夢中なんだ！
ただ、ファンの中には危険な者もいるみたいだ。
彼女を独り占めしたいと考える輩がね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_FRANCQUET_000_043<tab>If the rumors about Editha receiving death threats are true, one of those lecherous scoundrels must be behind it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_FRANCQUET_000_043<tab>脅迫状を送った犯人は、そういう類の奴だって、
もっぱらの噂だよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SIMPKIN_000_045<tab>Oh, to perform a duet with Editha would be a dream come true. Yet I am barely worthy of laying eyes upon, let alone sharing a stage with, one so divine.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SIMPKIN_000_045<tab>エディシアは、グリダニア音楽界に彗星のごとく現れた天才さ。
とにかくその演奏力は、人間離れしているんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ESTAINE_000_046<tab>The amphitheatre has never seen such crowds for a solo harpsichordist before. Some even claim that she has a certain “otherworldly charm,” although I am not quite sure what they mean by that.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ESTAINE_000_046<tab>エディシアの音楽会は常に満員御礼だよ。
その演奏力もさることながら、彼女の奇抜なファッションや、
個性的なキャラクターが、市民たちの人気を集めているようだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_FRANCQUET_000_047<tab>As you may have heard, Editha has not appeared in public since someone in the audience threw a stone at her. A stone! Can you believe it!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_FRANCQUET_000_047<tab>エディシアに脅迫状を送った犯人は、危険なファンだって、
もっぱらの噂だよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, have you met Miss Ondine? She's a harpsichordist, like Editha.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_050<tab>聞き込みをしてくれたようだな。
こちらの女性は、オンディヌさんといって、
彼女もハープシコードの奏者らしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_000_051<tab>That poor girl! What is the world coming to? That a gifted and beautiful young performer such as her must hide away for fear of her life─it beggars belief!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_000_051<tab>エディシアは素晴らしい才能を持っている娘よ。
これからも、まだまだ伸びるはずなのに、
活動休止に追い込まれるなんて、残念でならないの。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_000_052<tab>It must be one of her followers. I've seen the way some of them look at her, and it makes my skin crawl. With fans like that, who needs enemies?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_000_052<tab>脅迫状の送り主はきっと、行き過ぎたファンに違いないわ。
でも、あなたたちがエディシアを護ってくれるそうでよかった。
これで、彼女も安心して外に出られるわね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_053<tab>So, what did the other locals have to say?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_053<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
君が聞き込みで得た情報を教えてくれないか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_054<tab>Yes, most of them think that one of Editha's admirers is to blame, but I sense there's more to it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_054<tab>ふむ……やはり、脅迫状を送ったのは、
過激なファンである可能性が高いようだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_055<tab>I think that until we have more information, we should treat everyone with equal suspicion, to be on the safe side. Personally, I'd prefer to carry out a more thorough investigation, but we'd best not keep our clients waiting. Once you are ready, let us return to Lassenchou.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_055<tab>だとすると、本当に危害を加えるつもりというより、
脅しをかけたかっただけかもしれないが、油断は禁物だ。
さあ、準備を整えたらラサンシューさんのもとへ向かおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>You have learned all gunbreaker actions and traits to level 60. Detailed descriptions can be viewed in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Actions & Traits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window, accessed under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>ガンブレイカー、レベル60までのアクションを修得済みです。
メインコマンドの「アクションリスト」から、
使用できるアクションを確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_058<tab>If I were Lassenchou, I would have hired an investigator to catch the villain instead. An agent of enquiry or some such, perhaps.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_058<tab>どうやら、ラサンシューさんの準備は万端のようだな。
さて、初仕事といこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_059<tab>After hearing so much about Editha, I can't wait to finally meet her!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_059<tab>エディシアって、どんな娘なんだろうね……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_060<tab>Editha assures me that she will be ready in two shakes of a ziz's tail, whatever that means.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_060<tab>そちらも、準備ができたようですね。
すみませんが、エディシアが支度に手間取っているので、
もうしばらく、お待ちください。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_061<tab>Ah, my chaperones have arrived! How wonderful!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_061<tab>おっまた～。
あなたたちが、護ってくれる人？
私はエディシア、どうぞよろぴくね～！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_062<tab>Oh, to finally feel the sun's warming rays! I am reborn!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_062<tab>わ～い！
おひさまてんてん、いい天気～！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_063<tab>They weren't joking when they called her eccentric.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_063<tab>想像以上に、変わった娘だったね……。
それにしても、斬新なファッションセンスだわ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_064<tab>Ungh... All this prancing about is going to draw unwanted attention. We'd better get this over with as quickly as possible.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_064<tab>よ、よし、それでは護衛開始といこう。
だが、この人数でぞろぞろ歩くと、目立ってしまい、
かえって標的の到来を、犯人に報せてしまう恐れがある。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_065<tab>Sophie─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I will escort her to the amphitheatre. Why don't you stay behind with Lassenchou in case we need to hurry back?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_065<tab>護衛は、私と<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
このふたりに任せてくれないか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_066<tab>Fine by me. I'll keep an ear out for any signs of danger, and come running if you call.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_066<tab>まあ、ふたりで充分そうだし、
大人しく待っとくよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_067<tab>Although I was fully prepared to join you in guarding Editha, and even dressed for the occasion, I will defer to your professional opinion and remain here. But promise me that you will keep my sweet petunia safe!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_067<tab>確かに、私は足手まといにしかなりませんね……。
どうか、エディシアをよろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_068<tab>Leave it to us. Are you ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_068<tab>さあ、ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂まで、抜かりなくゆくぞ！

source:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_069<tab>La la la!♪
What a beautiful day for a stroll!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_069<tab>お散歩、しゅっぱ～つ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Head for Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂へ向かえ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Quiz the locals!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>人々に話しかけて情報を集めろ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_QIB_001_TODO_3<tab>Protect Editha and defeat the assailants!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_QIB_001_TODO_3<tab>エディシアを護りながら敵を倒せ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_QIB_EDITHA_HPGAUGE<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_QIB_EDITHA_HPGAUGE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>We only need to escort her to the amphitheatre and back, but keep your eyes peeled!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>さあ、護衛開始だ！
ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂まで、彼女を無事に届けるぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>Who goes there?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>その身なり、森で襲ってきた盗賊団の者か！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_BANDIT03262A_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>Never you mind. Step away from the girl, nice and slow.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_BANDIT03262A_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>いいから、その小娘を置いていきな。
さもなくば、力ずくで奪い取るまでだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>I think not. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, don't let them near her!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>そうはさせるか！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、エディシアさんを護るぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_005<tab>There could be more of them, so be on your guard!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_005<tab>まさか、街中に盗賊団が潜んでいるとはな。
しかし、なぜ奴らが彼女を……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SAETHRYDA_BATTLETALK_000_006<tab>Is that...? It is! It's Editha!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SAETHRYDA_BATTLETALK_000_006<tab>あれは……！？
人気ハープシコード奏者のエディシアじゃない！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_007<tab>Hmm... An unwanted distraction, but perhaps they can tell us why those bandits are after Editha.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_007<tab>やれやれ、ファンに足止めされたか……。
ものはついでだ、エディシアさんについて聞き込みしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SAETHRYDA_BATTLETALK_000_008<tab>(-Saethryda-)Is it true her music is inspired by all of the wondrous places she's seen on her travels?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SAETHRYDA_BATTLETALK_000_008<tab>(-セースリダ-)私はエディシアの大ファンなの！
こんなに近くで見れるなんて感激だわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_MILLITHIRONHEART_BATTLETALK_000_009<tab>(-Millith Ironheart-)I hear that Editha has become something of a recluse of late. I do hope she returns to grace the stage once more!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_MILLITHIRONHEART_BATTLETALK_000_009<tab>(-ミリス・アイアンハート-)エディシアの演奏は、探検にも劣らぬ魅力があるわ。
活動休止したって聞いたけど、元気そうでなによりね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_YMHITRA_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>(-Y'mhitra-)Editha has only recently begun performing in Gridania and has already amassed a considerable following. I have heard, however, that some of the other harpsichordists are envious of her success.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_YMHITRA_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>(-ヤ・ミトラ-)エディシアが恨みを買うとしたら、行き過ぎたファンか、
もしくは、彼女に嫉妬する同業者かしら……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_JONATHAS_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>(-Jonathas-)You are escorting the lovely Editha? Please, allow me to make a record of this day's events.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_JONATHAS_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>(-ジョナサス-)いまは、お前さんの体験談を聞いているときではない。
とにかく、エディシアちゃんと握手を……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_YSHUWAHE_BATTLETALK_000_012<tab>(-Y'shuwahe-)The whole of Gridania delights in Editha's magnificent melodies. Every other musician pales in comparison to her.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_YSHUWAHE_BATTLETALK_000_012<tab>(-ヤ・シュワエ-)エディシアの人気は本当にすごいの。
彼女の登場で、ほかの演奏家がかすんじゃうくらいよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_BANDIT03262B_BATTLETALK_000_013<tab>There she is, with the rabbit ears!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_BANDIT03262B_BATTLETALK_000_013<tab>野郎ども！　うさぎ耳をつけた小娘を狙え！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_014<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_014<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_YMHITRA_BATTLETALK_000_015<tab>Perhaps you would benefit from my ministrations. Allow me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_YMHITRA_BATTLETALK_000_015<tab>事情はわからないけど、緊急事態のようね。
回復は私に任せてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_016<tab>I'm sure there are others ready to crawl out of the woodwork. Stay alert!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_016<tab>ほかにも敵の気配がする、よく周りに注意しておくんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_017<tab>So, you get the impression that a jealous rival is the instigator?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_017<tab>なるほど、彼女の人気によってかすんでしまった、
同業者の嫉妬という可能性もあるわけだな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_018<tab>We must be ready to strike at a moment's notice.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_018<tab>引き続き注意しながら進もう。
奴らはどこから襲ってくるかわからないぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_019<tab>At times like these, the Royal Guard stance is probably your best option.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_019<tab>「ロイヤルガード」の技を利用するんだ。
敵を引き付けやすくなるぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_BATTLETALK_000_020<tab>The light...it grows dim...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_BATTLETALK_000_020<tab>そ、そんな……わたぴは……ただ、おひさまを……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_101<tab>Gah! They never learn... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, take the left again!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_101<tab>私は右の盗賊を片付ける！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、左の奴らを頼む！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HODDYN_BATTLETALK_000_102<tab>What's going on here?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HODDYN_BATTLETALK_000_102<tab>おい、何をやっている！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_103<tab>Your assistance is much appreciated!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_103<tab>加勢に感謝する！
襲いくる盗賊団から、エディシアさんを護るのだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_104<tab>I can tell this one's a cut above the rest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_104<tab>頭目の登場のようだな！
君にソイルの使い方を教えておこう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_105<tab>Use Solid Barrel to ready a cartridge, then Gnashing Fang to release the aether.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_105<tab>「ソリッドバレル」でソイルに魔力を込めることができる。
それによって強力な「ビートファング」を放てるぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_106<tab>That's it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_106<tab>やるじゃないか！
その調子で、このまま奴を片付けるぞ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_BANDITLEADER03262_BATTLETALK_000_107<tab>What was that...?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_BANDITLEADER03262_BATTLETALK_000_107<tab>クソッ、なんて強さだ。
こんな手強い護衛がいるなんて、聞いてないぞ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HODDYN_BATTLETALK_000_108<tab>Leave these ruffians to me! I and the other Wood Wailers will get to the bottom of this.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HODDYN_BATTLETALK_000_108<tab>こいつらは私に任せてくれ。
鬼哭隊屯所に連行し、ゆっくり話を聞いておこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_109<tab>Not much farther now!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_109<tab>さあ、ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂までもうすぐだ。
最後まで抜かりなくゆこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_110<tab>It's too quiet... They must be expecting us.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_110<tab>おかしい……真昼間なのにやけに静かだぞ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_100_070<tab>(-Masked Assailant-)My my, what a naughty little rabbit. It seems you've wandered too far from your warren.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_100_070<tab>(-仮面の女-)バカな娘ね……
大人しく部屋に籠もってればいいものを……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_200_070<tab>(-Masked Assailant-)The stage is set for your curtain call, though it cost me a pretty penny to rent the place.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_200_070<tab>(-仮面の女-)アンタが音楽堂に来るって聞いたんで、
大金をはたいて、ここを貸し切らせてもらったの。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_100_071<tab>(-Masked Assailant-)This will be the last time you walk all over <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> stage with those grubby little paws of yours.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_100_071<tab>(-仮面の女-)この舞台は私のものよ！
もう二度と足を踏み入れられないよう、
アンタには永遠に消えてもらうわ……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_BATTLETALK_000_201<tab>Useless! And you call yourselves professionals... Looks like it's time to introduce the little rabbit to my kitty!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_BATTLETALK_000_201<tab>まったく、役に立たない奴らね。
こうなったら、私のかわいい猫ちゃんの出番よ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_202<tab>Now she sends beasts after us?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_202<tab>どうやら、彼女が黒幕の脅迫者のようだが……
まさか、魔獣をけしかける気か！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_203<tab>No matter. We must protect Editha at all costs!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_203<tab>魔獣の攻撃を見極めてくれ！
エディシアさんに危害が及ばないよう立ち回るんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_204<tab>Hells' bells! That's lightning-aspected aether!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_204<tab>この魔獣、魔力で紡いだ雷を誘導できるようだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_205<tab>Try running into them! You'll get a nasty shock, but we can worry about that later!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_205<tab>エディシアさんに当たる前に、体当たりして散らすんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_BATTLETALK_000_206<tab>What are you waiting for!? Kill them!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_BATTLETALK_000_206<tab>アンタたち、さっさとやっちまいな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_207<tab>Reinforcements! Draw their attention away from Editha!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_207<tab>チッ、まだ盗賊が残っていたようだ！
先に奴らから倒すぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_208<tab>What's wrong? No more surprises?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_208<tab>よし、これで片付いたようだな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_BATTLETALK_000_209<tab>Sorry to disappoint you, but I'm afraid not.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_BATTLETALK_000_209<tab>私の……かわいい……猫ちゃんが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_210<tab>More of them? Stop them before they reach Editha!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_210<tab>紫雷の数が増えたぞ！
エディシアさんに当たる前に急げ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_BATTLETALK_000_211<tab>I want that talentless sow's head on a platter! And save me the bunny ears!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_BATTLETALK_000_211<tab>さあ、アンタたちには、大金を払ったんだから、
ちゃんと働いてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_212<tab>Remember, Editha is their target! Don't let her out of your sight!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_BATTLETALK_000_212<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、手分けして戦うぞ！
エディシアさんを必ず護り切るんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_070<tab>The show's over. Now, take off that mask, before I <var 1A 02 /var>cut<var 1A 01 /var> it off and your face with it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_070<tab>もう逃げられんぞ。
手荒な真似はしたくない、正体を現すんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_100_072<tab>Miss Ondine. I might have guessed. But what's Editha ever done to deserve this?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_100_072<tab>あんたは……ハープシコード奏者の……
なぜ、彼女を狙った……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_000_071<tab>That harlot doesn't know the first thing about real music! And she thinks she can steal my fans, <var 1A 02 /var>my stage<var 1A 01 /var>, with those appalling outfits of hers!? I won't stand for it... I won't!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_ONDINE_000_071<tab>ふん、エディシアのおかげで、私の人気は衰え忘れ去られた……。
派手な格好でひと目を引いただけの、ぽっと出の小娘に！
忌々しいったら、ありゃしない！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_072<tab>What happened here?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_072<tab>騒ぎが聞こえたから、神勇隊の人と駆けつけたんだ。
とにかく、無事なようでよかった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HONESTGODSQUIVERBOW_000_073<tab>I'd heard that Ondine wasn't exactly a fan of Editha's, but I never thought she'd pay to have her killed!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HONESTGODSQUIVERBOW_000_073<tab>オンディヌは神勇隊が連行しておいた。
まさか、彼女が盗賊団を雇ってこんなことを企てるとはね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HONESTGODSQUIVERBOW_000_074<tab>And now we know that the highwaymen in the woods were in on her schemes, too.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HONESTGODSQUIVERBOW_000_074<tab>オンディヌはハープシコードのベテラン奏者であり、
グリダニアでは有名な富豪のひとりなんだ。
そして、盗賊団の強盗に遭った被害者だった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HONESTGODSQUIVERBOW_000_075<tab>A few days back, they held up Ondine's carriage in the Shroud, but she made them an offer worth more than the valuables she was carryin'.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HONESTGODSQUIVERBOW_000_075<tab>おそらく、そのときに盗賊団と密かに繋がり、
エディシア嬢の殺害を依頼したのだろう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HONESTGODSQUIVERBOW_000_076<tab>Mind you, I don't suppose there's many of the bastards left after today. You've done us all a good turn, so if you ever need anythin' from the Gods' Quiver, don't hesitate to ask!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_HONESTGODSQUIVERBOW_000_076<tab>よもや、奴らが街中へと侵入し、
人気奏者を襲おうとしていたとは、想定外だったよ。
今回のキミたちの働きには、深く感謝するッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_077<tab>Now that the danger has passed, Editha will at long last be able to make her triumphant return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_077<tab>この度は、誠にありがとうございました。
黒幕も捕まったことで、これからは安心して、
エディシアの音楽活動を再開させることができます。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_078<tab>There's still one thing I don't quite understand. Why did those highwaymen attack me and Radovan in the woods?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_078<tab>ところで、盗賊団の狙いがエディシアなら、
なんで、アタシたちは森でヤツらに襲われたんだろう……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_079<tab>Maybe it was because of your ears? I imagine Ondine told them how much I love wearing my favorite bunny crown. They probably thought you were me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_079<tab>それはきっと、あなたの耳のせい。
私をよく知らない盗賊団が、間違えて襲ったんだわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_080<tab>Ho ho! These ones aren't real Viera ears! At least I don't think so... Actually, I was wondering if I might have a word in private with the three of you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_080<tab>護ってくれて、本当にありがとう。
あなたたちに、ぜひともお話したいことがあるの。
でも、人前では話しにくいから……場所を変えてもいい？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_081<tab>But...there are four of us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_081<tab>エディシア？
人前で話しにくいこととは何でしょう……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_082<tab>Yes, but only if I include you. Which I'm not.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_082<tab>ラサンシューはもう帰って、
レディのデリケートな話だから、絶対に教えない。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_083<tab>What have I done to deserve such treatment?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_083<tab>ええ……？
そ、そんな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_084<tab>Now that that pesky manager of mine is out of the way, let's go to the Greatloam Growery.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_084<tab>それじゃあ、お手数だけど、
あなたたちは、グレートローム農場までついてきて。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_085<tab><sigh> Well, I suppose a lady is entitled to her secrets. But before I return to my duties, I wish to express my gratitude for your part in today's events. You have both performed admirably.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_LASSENCHOU_000_085<tab>トホホ、なんで私だけ……。
大人しく、事務所に帰ることにします。
本当にお世話になりました……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_088<tab>I haven't the foggiest idea what this is about.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_088<tab>さて、いったい何の話だろうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_089<tab>What could it be? I'm almost afraid to find out...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_089<tab>どうする？
愛の告白だったら……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_090<tab>You risked life and limb to protect me, so I feel it's only fair that I explain myself. One moment, please.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_090<tab>手間をかけさせて、ごめんね。
護ってくれたあなたたちには、本当のことを知ってほしくて……。
私が外に出たいと言ったのは、単なるワガママじゃなかったの。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_100_090<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_100_090<tab>こ、これは、いったい……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_100_091<tab>You mean to say she was a sylph from the very beginning?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_100_091<tab>シルフ族という獣人だと……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_091<tab>Oh, yes. This one feels much more comfortable now. It is fun to use glamours and play the harpsichord, but a little tiring.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_091<tab>そう、わたぴの正体はシルフ族。
ハープシコードの音色に魅せられ、
ヒトに化けて奏者になったのでふっち。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_092<tab>And this one spent so long in walking one's house, this one nearly died! These ones need the sun's rays to flourish, to live! That is why this one had to go outside, even though dangerous ones were all around.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_092<tab>シルフ族には光合成が欠かせないのでふっち。
長い間、部屋に籠っていると死んでしまうから、
どうしても外に出て、日光を浴びる必要があったのでふっち。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_093<tab>This one hopes helpful ones will understand and not tell simpering one. Listening ones will be sad if this one can no longer play sweet, sweet music.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_093<tab>このことは、ラサンシューも知らない。
これからも、大好きなハープシコードを演奏したいから、
わたぴの正体、どうか秘密にしておいてほしいでふっち。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_094<tab>Your secret is safe with us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_094<tab>もちろんだとも。
ここで見たことは、墓まで持っていくことにしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_095<tab>I'm ever so grateful! Promise you'll come to listen to my harpsichord soon, yes? Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_EDITHA_000_095<tab>どうもありがとう！
いつか、あなたたちも、私の演奏を聴きにきて。
それじゃあまたね、バイビー！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_096<tab>Not quite the conclusion I was expecting, but a satisfactory one nonetheless. I must say, you've acquitted yourself rather well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_096<tab>思わぬ幕切れとなったが、初仕事を無事に終えたな。
そして君は、私の見込み以上に、
ガンブレイカーとしての素質を備えていたようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_097<tab>It normally takes a lot longer for novices to grasp the fundamental differences between a gunblade and a regular sword.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_097<tab>いまこそ、話が途中になっていた、
我らガンブレイカーのルーツを教えよう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_098<tab>It was originally developed by my people in the Third Astral Era. The march of the Allagan Empire had driven us to the barren wastelands, where even survival was a constant struggle.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_098<tab>古代アラグ帝国が栄華を誇っていた、第三星暦時代。
少数民族だったロスガル族は、巨大帝国に虐げられ、
僻地に築いた小国でひっそりと暮らしていた。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_099<tab>Our queen, Gunnhildr, was closely guarded by loyal soldiers known for the unique swords they wielded.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_099<tab>彼らを率いていた女王の名は「グンヒルド」。
そして、女王を護る近衛たちは、特殊な剣を持っていた。
武器であると同時に魔器でもある品を……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_100<tab>These loyal vassals were known as “Gunnhildr's Blades,” a name that was abbreviated and applied to the most distinctive of their weapons, the gunblade.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_100<tab>そう、「ガン」とはグンヒルドが略されたものであり、
ガンブレードとは「グンヒルドの剣」という意味なのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_101<tab>Meanwhile, the Allagans were developing firearms capable of launching projectiles over great distances. As they were similar in appearance to our gunblades, we referred to these weapons as “guns,” a term which is now commonplace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_101<tab>その後、アラグ帝国で弾丸を発射する武器が考案されたとき、
形状がガンブレードに似ていたために「ガン」と呼ばれた。
今に続く「銃」という言葉のルーツは、そこにある。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_102<tab>So effective were these new weapons on the battlefield, the queen's guard decided to specialize in smashing through the enemy lines and destroying them as swiftly as possible. Thus did they come to be known as “gunbreakers.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_102<tab>親衛隊の一族はアラグ帝国の侵略に抗い続け、
ことさらまがい物の「銃」を目の敵にして破壊した。
そこから、彼らは「ガンブレイカー」と呼ばれるようになったのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_103<tab>Even after the fall of the Allagan Empire, these techniques were passed down to each new generation. My clan are the descendants of Gunnhildr's royal guard, although I am all that remains.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_103<tab>結局、第四霊災によって、小国はアラグ帝国もろとも滅びた。
ガンブレイカーの技は、生き残った一族によって長い間、
ひっそりと継承されてきたが、それがいま途絶えつつある。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_104<tab>It is my duty to see that the art of the gunbreaker lives on, even if that means entrusting it to an outsider, such as yourself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_104<tab>かくいう私も、その一族の末裔。
君にガンブレイカーとなってもらったのは、
消えゆく技を引き継いでほしかった、という意図もあったのだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_105<tab>If you like history lessons, you two will get along like a house on fire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_105<tab>もう終わった……？
ともかく、オッサンが言いたいのは、
今後もキミに、ガンブレイカーとして精進してほしいってこと。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_106<tab>I'd best leave it there for the time being. I don't want to overwhelm the <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_106<tab>ま、まあ……結論はそういうことだ。
本当は一族以外の者に、技を授けるのは伝統に反するのだが、
君という逸材を見つけ、いてもたってもいられなくなったんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_107<tab>The best learning is done in the field, however. As pleasant as Gridania is, I am eager to see what the other city-states have to offer.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_107<tab>さて、エオルゼアといっても広い。
グリダニアだけに留まらず、次の都市に向かおうと思う。
ほかの地にも、きっと護衛を必要としている人がいるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_108<tab>Then may I suggest Ul'dah? Their markets have goods from all over the world, and I'm dying to take a look!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_108<tab>それじゃあ、ウルダハに行こう！
商人の国だから、いろんな物が売ってるらしいね！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_109<tab>Ul'dah it is, then. Sophie and I will go on ahead. When you arrive, seek us out. We shouldn't be hard to find.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_109<tab>それでは、ウルダハへ向かおう。
冒険者ギルドは各都市にあると聞いた。
まずは、そこで仕事を探すことにしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SYSTEM_100_110<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SYSTEM_100_110<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_115<tab>The best way to settle in to a new place is to dress like the locals! Well, that's my excuse, anyway.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_115<tab>いろんな物が売ってて目移りしちゃうね！
さっそく、この服を買っちゃったよ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_120<tab>It's good to finally get away from that noisy marketplace, not that this watering hole is much quieter. Still, it's a paradise compared to anything you'll find in Garlean territory.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_120<tab>ウルダハとは、かくも活気に溢れた街なのだな。
絶望や諦観が蔓延する帝国属州とは大違いだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_121<tab>I think he's just in a sour mood because he can't find any work.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_SOPHIE_000_121<tab>本当に賑やかでいいもんだね！
さっそく、この服を買っちゃったよ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_122<tab>You're not wrong there, Sophie. I'll keep looking though. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you'd better train by yourself until we find our next client. Which, with a little luck, will be soon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB102_03262_RADOVAN_000_122<tab>冒険者ギルドに、護衛の依頼がないか聞いてみたが、
さすがに、そう都合よくはないようだ。
仕事が入るまで、君はしばらく腕を磨いておいてくれ。
